abstracts.cdata!:
The First Cashewnut Development Project
            will provide construction and operation for five years of
            five cashew nut processing factories, of port storage
            facilities for cashew nut shell liquid, the establishment of
            cashew extension and grading services and research
            facilities; the construction of office and staff
            accommodations, water supply and education facilities; and
            the provision of technical services.
